name: Reuters Real Estate
overview:
Thomson Reuters provides intelligent information to the worldâ€™s businesses and professionals, giving customers competitive advantage.

Bringing together news, data, research, and analytics, Reuters Real Estate embodies this overarching promise, meeting the information needs of real estate investment professionals across all asset classes.

Able to access content from both Thomson Reuters and specialised real estate information providers, members in over 130 countries use Reuters Real Estate for essential information. See what selected members have to say in the Customer Feedback section.

Reuters Real Estate operates as an entrepreneurial venture within Thomson Reuters, run by a dedicated business team together with core real estate correspondents backed by a broader global network of 2,600 Thomson Reuters correspondents.

The Reuters Real Estate offering is constantly evolving and we are adding new content and features all the time.

Membership is based on an annual subscription model, and Standard Membership is free. Learn about the Standard membership and Premium membership benefits.
